ygData.subject: SV: Tinkering skill cap, fixed?
ygData.msgSnippet: No  you cant, they didnt fix it in the server patch. I petitioned again about  it but the only one i got an anwser from  was an aprentice guide. And you all
ygData.messageBody:
No you cant, they didnt fix it in the server patch. I petitioned again about it but the only one i got an anwser from was an aprentice guide. And you all know how much they can help you.

But he thought that when they fix it we are gonna see a msg about it, so keep on petition about this until they fix it.


Askur of Veeshan

- Original Message -----
From: tomservo8899 <tomservo8899@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 10:12 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Tinkering skill cap, fixed?


> From: "tomservo8899" <tomservo8899@...>
>
> I just read that the patch that was supposed to be this morning was actually
> already done. They did it when the servers were down with that Cerfnet and
> UUnet trouble. Anyway, I was wondering if anyone has tried the tinkering
> skill since the patch to see if the skill cap (I think it was (Level - 15) x
> 5) has been fixed yet. I had been hoping that they would fix it in this
> patch after someone reported that a GM said they should be fixing it soon,
> maybe even in the next patch. If anyone knows if you can Tinker outside the
> level cap now please say so =)
>
> Logalog,
> Veeshan Server
>
>
